print.name: 20 Years of Paul Smith and Maharam
print.description: This book highlights our studios’ shared commitment to design and long-term exploration of traditional motifs reimagined through color, pattern, and scale. Three randomized cover variations.
print.contact: To order this item, contact Media at media@maharam.com

print.name: Bertjan Pot
print.description: Sales tool celebrating the work of Bertjan Pot which includes an interview between Marco Velardi and Bertjan Pot and with photography by Nick Ballón.
print.contact: To order this item, contact Media at media@maharam.com

print.name: Repeat by Hella Jongerius
print.description: A book documenting the process around Repeat by Hella Jongerius and Maharam's first textile collaboration with Hella Jongerius.

print.description: A book celebrating Artek and Maharam's ongoing exploration of textile application on the Stool 60 by Alvar Aalto.

print.name: Book Shipping Box
print.description: Shipping box for 60 60 and Bertjan Pot books.

print.name: The Archetypes
print.description: A set of twelve 15" x 22.75" newsprint posters, each features a single character named for Swiss psychoanalyst Carl Jung's twelve archetypes of personality and incorporates Maharam textiles.
print.contact: To order this item, contact Media at media@maharam.com

print.name: Sonnhild Kestler Poster Set
print.description: A series of poster sets including four original designs and an in-depth process booklet featuring photography by Nick Ballón. Three randomized cover variations.
print.contact: To order this item, contact Media at media@maharam.com

print.name: Notebook
print.description: Single, cloth-bound notebook with perforated micro-grid paper. Forty-eight sheets.

print.name: Notebook Set
print.description: Set of three, cloth-bound notebooks with perforated micro-grid paper. Forty-eight sheets each.

print.name: Memory Two

print.description: Two sets of thirty-six cards interpreting Maharam textiles. Four randomized cover variations.

print.name: Calendar 2025
print.description: Cloth-bound weekly, monthly, and yearly agendas with lined note pages. Includes birthdates of architects and designers, moon phases, and major holidays. 132 sheets. Three randomized cover variations.

print.name: Maharam Digital Projects Notecard Set
